entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
